archimate:BusinessService.name: Direct Debit Mandate
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use:
A customer completes a direct debit mandate for a corporate client
General comment:
The direct debit mandates for all customers are maintained as they relate to a direct debit facility handed for a corporate client.
Business Purpose : Manage the customer mandates associated with a direct debit processing facility for a corporate client
Пример использования:
Клиент завершает мандат прямого дебетования для корпоративного клиента
Общее замечание:
Мандаты прямого дебетования для всех клиентов сохраняются, поскольку они относятся к механизму прямого дебетования, переданному корпоративному клиенту.
деловая цель : Управление мандатами клиента, связанными со средством обработки прямого дебетования для корпоративного клиента
Service Domain - Direct Debit Mandate Customer mandates are administered/managed that are associated with a direct debit processing facility provided for a corporate client. The individual customer mandates are registered and may be updated/amended. The mandates are referenced to confirm coverage when direct debit processing is undertaken periodically
Executive Summary This service domains manages the customer mandates associated with direct debit processing for a corporate client
Examples Of Use A customer completes a direct debit mandate for a corporate client that is registered
